title: Doug Field to Discuss Ford’s Focus on Software-Defined Vehicles and Services at Bernstein Conference on Nov. 7
description: Ford Model e Chief Advanced Product Development and Technology Officer Doug Field will participate in a virtual fireside chat with technology analyst Toni Sacconaghi at Bernstein’s 6th Electric Revolution Conference in London on Monday, November 7, 2022, at 10:30 a.m. ET (3:30 p.m. GMT).
